item.title: CVE-2023-50827|2024-08-02T22:23:44.213Z -- accredible -- accredible%20certificates%20%26%20open%20badges
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Accredible Accredible Certificates & Open Badges allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Accredible Certificates & Open Badges: from n/a through 1.4.8.
